snippet: The Kurds, a stateless people, have held the front against ISIS in Iraq. Is America helping them?
abstract: Op-Ed article by anthropologist Scott Atran and retired Major General Douglas M Stone celebrates heroic achievement of Kurdish people in holding back Islamic State incursion along a 640-mile front in Iraq; calls on United States officials to provide Kurds with far more material assistance, arguing they make fine allies, both in terms of their tenacity and their inclusive, moderate ideology.

byline.original: By SCOTT ATRAN and DOUGLAS M. STONE

lead_paragraph: The Kurds, a stateless people, have held the front against ISIS in Iraq. Is America helping them?

headline.print_headline: The Kurds’ Heroic Stand Against ISIS
headline.main: The Kurds’ Heroic Stand Against ISIS

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
